title: Biden defends Inflation Reduction Act, dares critics to name a failure in anniversary speech
description: President Biden marked the one-year anniversary of the Inflation Reduction Act with a passionate speech in the East Room of the White House. He challenged critics to name a single objective that the United States has ever failed to achieve. Biden showcased his administration's achievements and defen...

title: Food inflation may ease in next 2-3 months, says Fin Min official
description:
Food inflation is expected to plateau going ahead.

The Union Finance Ministry expects food inflation to cool down in the next two-three months as issues that have triggered higher food prices are manageable, a senior official at the ministry said.

"Inflation may plateau going further, especially t...
